verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came to me saying

הָלֹ֡ךְ <WH1980> Go וְקָֽרָאתָ֩ <WH7121> and cry בְאָזְנֵ֨י <WH241> in the ears יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God זָכַ֤רְתִּי <WH2142> I remember לָךְ֙ חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> thee the kindness נְעוּרַ֔יִךְ <WH5271> of thy youth אַהֲבַ֖ת <WH160> the love כְּלוּלֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH3623> of thine espousals לֶכְתֵּ֤ךְ <WH1980> your following אַחֲרַי֙ <WH310> after בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> me in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in a land לֹ֥א <WH3808> not זְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH2232> [that was] not sown

קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> [was] holiness יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD רֵאשִׁ֖ית <WH7225> [and] the firstfruits תְּבוּאָתֹ֑ה <WH8393> of his increase כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֹכְלָ֣יו <WH398> all that devour יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <WH816> him shall offend רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil תָּבֹ֥א <WH935> shall come אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> upon נְאֻם־ <WH5002> upon them saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <WH4940> and all the families בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD מַה־ <WH4100> What מָּצְא֨וּ <WH4672> found אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֥ם <WH1> have your fathers בִּי֙ עָ֔וֶל <WH5766> What iniquity כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רָחֲק֖וּ <WH7368> in me that they are gone far מֵעָלָ֑י <WH5921> and וַיֵּֽלְכ֛וּ <WH1980> and walked אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after הַהֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> vanity וַיֶּהְבָּֽלוּ׃ <WH1891> and are become vain

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no אָמְר֔וּ <WH559> Neither said אַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> Where יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> they Where [is] the LORD הַמַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> that brought us up אֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הַמּוֹלִ֨יךְ <WH1980> led אֹתָ֜נוּ <WH853> בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> us through the wilderness בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> through a land עֲרָבָ֤ה <WH6160> of deserts וְשׁוּחָה֙ <WH7745> and of pits בְּאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> through a land צִיָּ֣ה <WH6723> of drought וְצַלְמָ֔וֶת <WH6757> and of the shadow of death בְּאֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> through a land לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no עָ֤בַר <WH5674> passed through בָּהּ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> that no man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> dwelt אָדָ֖ם <WH120> and where no man שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> and where

וָאָבִ֤יא <WH935> And I brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3759> you into a plentiful לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to eat פִּרְיָ֖הּ <WH6529> the fruit וְטוּבָ֑הּ <WH2898> thereof and the goodness וַתָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> thereof but when ye entered וַתְּטַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> ye defiled אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצִ֔י <WH776> my land וְנַחֲלָתִ֥י <WH5159> mine heritage שַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <WH7760> and made לְתוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <WH8441> an abomination

הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> The priests לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not אָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said אַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> Where יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Jehovah וְתֹפְשֵׂ֤י <WH8610> catch הַתּוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> the law לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יְדָע֔וּנִי <WH3045> knew וְהָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> me not the pastors פָּ֣שְׁעוּ <WH6586> also transgressed בִ֑י וְהַנְּבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> against me and the prophets נִבְּא֣וּ <WH5012> prophesied בַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> by Baal וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not יוֹעִ֖לוּ <WH3276> [things that] do not profit הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> and walked

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore עֹ֛ד <WH5750> will yet אָרִ֥יב <WH7378> Wherefore I will yet plead אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for נְאֻם־ <WH5002> with you saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and with your children's בְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> children אָרִֽיב׃ <WH7378> will I plead

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For עִבְר֞וּ <WH5674> For pass over אִיֵּ֤י <WH339> the isles כִתִּיִּים֙ <WH3794> of Chittim וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> and see וְקֵדָ֛ר <WH6938> unto Kedar שִׁלְח֥וּ <WH7971> and send וְהִֽתְבּוֹנְנ֖וּ <WH995> and consider מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> diligently וּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> and see הֵ֥ן <WH2005> if הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> has been כָּזֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

הַהֵימִ֥יר <WH4171> have changed גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> Hath a nation אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [their] gods וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> gods וְעַמִּ֛י <WH5971> folk הֵמִ֥יר <WH4171> have changed כְּבוֹד֖וֹ <WH3519> their glory בְּל֥וֹא <WH1094> old יוֹעִֽיל׃ <WH3276> for [that which] doth not profit

שֹׁ֥מּוּ <WH8074> Be astonished שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> O ye heavens עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְשַׂעֲר֛וּ <WH8175> at this and be horribly afraid חָרְב֥וּ <WH2717> desolate מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> be ye very נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> two רָע֖וֹת <WH7451> evils עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> have committed עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> For my people אֹתִ֨י <WH853> עָזְב֜וּ <WH5800> they have forsaken מְק֣וֹר ׀ <WH4726> me the fountain מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters חַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> of living לַחְצֹ֤ב <WH2672> [and] hewed them out לָהֶם֙ בֹּאר֔וֹת <WH877> cisterns בֹּארֹת֙ <WH877> cisterns נִשְׁבָּרִ֔ים <WH7665> broken אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָכִ֖לוּ <WH3557> that can hold הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> no water

הַעֶ֙בֶד֙ <WH5650> bondage יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> [Is] Israel אִם־ <WH518> lo יְלִ֥יד <WH3211> born בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> court ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> [slave]? why הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לָבַֽז׃ <WH957> booty

עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and יִשְׁאֲג֣וּ <WH7580> roared כְפִרִ֔ים <WH3715> The young lions נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> add קוֹלָ֑ם <WH6963> aloud וַיָּשִׁ֤יתוּ <WH7896> and they made אַרְצוֹ֙ <WH776> his land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> waste עָרָ֥יו <WH5892> his cities [נִצְּתָה כ] (נִצְּת֖וּ <WH3341> burn ק) מִבְּלִ֥י <WH1097> without יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> without inhabitant גַּם־ <WH1571> again בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted
נֹ֖ף <WH5297> of Noph [וְתַחְפְּנֵס כ] (וְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <WH8471> Tahanites ק) יִרְע֖וּךְ <WH7462> have broken קָדְקֹֽד׃ <WH6936> the crown of thy head

הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not זֹ֖את <WH2063> not תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Hast thou not procured לָּ֑ךְ עָזְבֵךְ֙ <WH5800> this unto thyself in that thou hast forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔יִךְ <WH430> thy God בְּעֵ֖ת <WH6256> when מוֹלִיכֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> led בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> But

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now מַה־ <WH4100> what לָּךְ֙ לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> And now what hast thou to do in the way מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> to drink מֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters שִׁח֑וֹר <WH7883> Shihor וּמַה־ <WH4100> what לָּךְ֙ לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the road אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> to drink מֵ֥י <WH4325> the waters נָהָֽר׃ <WH5104> flood

תְּיַסְּרֵ֣ךְ <WH3256> shall correct רָעָתֵ֗ךְ <WH7451> Thine own wickedness וּמְשֻֽׁבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4878> thee and thy backslidings תּוֹכִחֻ֔ךְ <WH3198> shall reprove וּדְעִ֤י <WH3045> thee know וּרְאִי֙ <WH7200> therefore and see כִּי־ <WH3588> that it רַ֣ע <WH7451> that [it is] an evil וָמָ֔ר <WH4751> [thing] and bitter עָזְבֵ֖ךְ <WH5800> that thou hast forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יִךְ <WH430> thy God וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not פַחְדָּתִי֙ <WH6345> and that my fear אֵלַ֔יִךְ <WH413> you נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [is] not in thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מֵעוֹלָ֞ם <WH5769> For of old time שָׁבַ֣רְתִּי <WH7665> I have broken עֻלֵּ֗ךְ <WH5923> thy yoke נִתַּ֙קְתִּי֙ <WH5423> [and] burst מוֹסְרֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH4147> thy bands וַתֹּאמְרִ֖י <WH559> and thou saidst לֹ֣א <WH3808> not [אֶעֱבֹד כ] (אֶעֱבֹ֑ור <WH5647> serve ק) כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֞ה <WH1389> hill גְּבֹהָ֗ה <WH1364> when upon every high וְתַ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָ֔ן <WH7488> and under every green אַ֖תְּ <WH859> You צֹעָ֥ה <WH6808> thou wanderest זֹנָֽה׃ <WH2181> playing the harlot

וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I נְטַעְתִּ֣יךְ <WH5193> Yet I had planted שֹׂרֵ֔ק <WH8321> thee a noble vine כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> A completely זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> seed אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> wholly a right וְאֵיךְ֙ <WH349> How נֶהְפַּ֣כְתְּ <WH2015> how then art thou turned לִ֔י סוּרֵ֖י <WH5494> into the degenerate plant הַגֶּ֥פֶן <WH1612> vine נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> of a strange

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo תְּכַבְּסִי֙ <WH3526> For though thou wash בַּנֶּ֔תֶר <WH5427> thee with nitre וְתַרְבִּי־ <WH7235> and take thee much לָ֖ךְ בֹּרִ֑ית <WH1287> soap נִכְתָּ֤ם <WH3799> is marked עֲוֹנֵךְ֙ <WH5771> [yet] thine iniquity לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How תֹּאמְרִ֞י <WH559> How canst thou say לֹ֣א <WH3808> I am not נִטְמֵ֗אתִי <WH2930> I am not polluted אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after הַבְּעָלִים֙ <WH1168> Baal לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not הָלַ֔כְתִּי <WH1980> I have not gone רְאִ֤י <WH7200> advise self דַרְכֵּךְ֙ <WH1870> thy way בַּגַּ֔יְא <WH1516> in the valley דְּעִ֖י <WH3045> know מֶ֣ה <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֑ית <WH6213> what thou hast done בִּכְרָ֥ה <WH1072> dromedary קַלָּ֖ה <WH7031> [thou art] a swift מְשָׂרֶ֥כֶת <WH8308> traversing דְּרָכֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1870> her ways

פֶּ֣רֶה ׀ <WH6501> A wild ass לִמֻּ֣ד <WH3928> used מִדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> to the wilderness בְּאַוַּ֤ת <WH185> desire [נַפשֹׁו כ] (נַפְשָׁהּ֙ <WH5315> any ק) שָׁאֲפָ֣ה <WH7602> [that] snuffeth up ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> the wind תַּאֲנָתָ֖הּ <WH8385> in her occasion מִ֣י <WH4310> who יְשִׁיבֶ֑נָּה <WH7725> who can turn her away כָּל־ <WH3605> who מְבַקְשֶׁ֙יהָ֙ <WH1245> ? all they that seek לֹ֣א <WH3808> her will not יִיעָ֔פוּ <WH3286> her will not weary בְּחָדְשָׁ֖הּ <WH2320> themselves in her month יִמְצָאֽוּנְהָ׃ <WH4672> they shall find

מִנְעִ֤י <WH4513> Withhold רַגְלֵךְ֙ <WH7272> thy foot מִיָּחֵ֔ף <WH3182> from being unshod [וּגֹורֹנֵךְ כ] (וּגְרֹונֵ֖ךְ <WH1637> barn ק) מִצִּמְאָ֑ה <WH6773> from thirst וַתֹּאמְרִ֣י <WH559> but thou saidst נוֹאָ֔שׁ <WH2976> There is no hope ל֕וֹא <WH3808> No כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָהַ֥בְתִּי <WH157> no for I have loved זָרִ֖ים <WH2114> strangers וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֥ם <WH310> and after אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> along

כְּבֹ֤שֶׁת <WH1322> is ashamed גַּנָּב֙ <WH1590> As the thief כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יִמָּצֵ֔א <WH4672> when he is found כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So הֹבִ֖ישׁוּ <WH954> is shamed בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> so is the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> They מַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> they their kings שָֽׂרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8269> their princes וְכֹהֲנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3548> and their priests וּנְבִיאֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5030> and their prophets

אֹמְרִ֨ים <WH559> Saying לָעֵ֜ץ <WH6086> to a stock אָ֣בִי <WH1> Thou [art] my father אַ֗תָּה <WH859> and to וְלָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> and to a stone אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you [יְלִדְתִּני כ] (יְלִדְתָּ֔נוּ <WH3205> bear ק) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָנ֥וּ <WH6437> for they have turned אֵלַ֛י <WH413> to עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> [their] back וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not פָנִ֑ים <WH6440> unto me and not [their] face וּבְעֵ֤ת <WH6256> but in the time רָֽעָתָם֙ <WH7451> of their trouble יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> they will say ק֖וּמָה <WH6965> Arise וְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3467> and save
